improvement_list.improvement_desc: The while loop may not terminate if lists contains empty sublists.  Add a check to handle this case.
The initial value of min_val is very large. If lists contain negative numbers, this could lead to unexpected results.
Add input validation to ensure lists is not null and contains only valid numerical lists.
The inner loop condition should include a check for empty sublists to prevent accessing lists[j][pointers[j]] when lists[j] is empty. Add a check for this before the comparison.
